title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 Point

  • 1 - for MC=MR=P or MR=MC or P=MC
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

1 - for MC=MR=P or MR=MC or P=MC

The student earns all of the following points:

1 - for MC=MR=P or MR=MC or P=MC

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
2 Points

  • 1 - Price equals $25

  • 1 - Market/industry determines the price.

Or price may be used to link marginal revenue to average revenue.
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

  • 1 - Price equals $25

  • 1 - Market/industry determines the price.

Or price may be used to link marginal revenue to average revenue.

The student earns one of the following points:

  • 1 - Price equals $25

  • 1 - Market/industry determines the price.

Or price may be used to link marginal revenue to average revenue.

The student earns all of the following points:

  • 1 - Price equals $25

  • 1 - Market/industry determines the price.

Or price may be used to link marginal revenue to average revenue.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: 1- for yes, and reason P>AVC or TR>TVC.
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

1 - for yes, and reason P>AVC or TR>TVC.

The student earns all of the following points:

1 - for yes, and reason P>AVC or TR>TVC.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml: 1 - for loss and reason - P<ATC or TR<TC is acceptable.
descriptions:
The student earns none of the following points:

1 - for loss and reason - P<ATC or TR<TC is acceptable.

The student earns all of the following points:

1 - for loss and reason - P<ATC or TR<TC is acceptable.
